csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="in-text"
      version="1.0"
      xml:lang="en">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <text value="hello" />
    </layout>
  </citation>
  <bibliography 
         line-spacing="2">
    <layout>
      <group delimiter=" ">
        <group delimiter=", ">
          <names variable="author">
            <name />
          </names>
          <text variable="title" />
        </group>
        <date prefix="(" suffix=")" variable="issued">
          <date-part name="year" />
        </date>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </bibliography>
</style>
